protein.specific_function: Haptoglobin combines with free plasma hemoglobin, preventing loss of iron through the kidneys and protecting the kidneys from damage by hemoglobin, while making the hemoglobin accessible to degradative enzymes

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides
